## üó∫Ô∏è Navigation Guide

### New to [Project Name]?

1. Start with the **[Main README](../README.md)** for installation
2. Follow the **[Getting Started Guide](guides/getting-started.md)** for basics
3. Try the **[Quickstart Tutorial](guides/quickstart.md)** for your first project
4. Explore **[User Guide](guides/user-guide.md)** to unlock advanced features

## ü§ù Contributing Documentation

Found a typo? Want to add a tutorial? Contributions are welcome!

1. Documentation files are in `docs/`
2. Use clear headings and code examples
3. Add your document to this index
4. Submit a PR with your changes

**Documentation standards:**
- Use present tense ("Click" not "Clicked")
- Include code examples for every concept
- Test all commands/code before submitting
- Use screenshots/GIFs where helpful

---

- **Questions:** Check guides first, then open a discussion
